name: VerticalAlignment
shortdesc: The vertical alignment of an anchored object.

property.name: TOP_ALIGN
property.shortdesc: Place the anchored object at the top of the vertical reference point.

property.name: BOTTOM_ALIGN
property.shortdesc: Place the anchored object at the bottom of the vertical reference point.

property.name: CENTER_ALIGN
property.shortdesc: Place the anchored object at the vertical center of the vertical reference point.
